summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3374 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 1, being the alley between 11th Avenue North and 12th Avenue North, from East Roy Street to East Aloha Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 41808, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
